Uses of Package
org.simplity.gateway

  • Packages that use org.simplity.gateway 
    Package Description
    org.simplity.gateway  
    org.simplity.http
    http utility classes required to 1.
    org.simplity.kernel.data  
    org.simplity.kernel.db
    classes that deal with rdbms on top of jdbc
    org.simplity.rest
    classes that handle open-api requests
    org.simplity.service
    as a client, this is all you need to know as to how to ask the server for a service and get response.
  • Classes in org.simplity.gateway used by org.simplity.gateway 
    Class and Description
    Gateway
    static class to manage all aspects of a gateway
    OutboundAgent
    Service agent to get response for an external service that a simplity service wants as part of its execution step.
    ReqReader
    translate data from data source to service context based on InputDataSpecification, or create output data from service context based on OutputData specification
    ReqReader.InputValueType
    type of value received as input
    RespWriter 
  • Classes in org.simplity.gateway used by org.simplity.http

    Gateway
    static class to manage all aspects of a gateway

  • Classes in org.simplity.gateway used by org.simplity.rest
